main event: A civilian graduate student in Chemistry observed a disc-shaped unidentified flying object in St. Louis, Missouri on September 17, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as disc-shaped and metallic gray,The object was estimated to be approximately 500 yards in diameter,It emitted a whistling or humming sound that attracted attention,The object made an erratic motion difficult for conventional aircraft,The sighting lasted approximately 20-25 seconds.
witness description: civilian graduate student in Chemistry at Washington University
